resources.string:
To search contacts, click the magnifying glass at the top right and enter your query. 

The search will attempt to match any type of detail such as name, phone number, street address, email address, and so forth. Results are alphabetized. 

You may also automatically get directions to their address via Maps if it exists, set a reminder for their birthday, or email them by expanding a result.
No contacts matched your query. Sorry!
